Chuhuiv Weather App v1.0.0 - Self-Contained Release
========================================================

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS
=========================

This is a self-contained release that includes the .NET 9.0 runtime.
No additional software installation is required.

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:
- Windows 10 version 1809 or newer
- 64-bit processor (x64 architecture)
- Minimum 200 MB free disk space
- Internet connection for weather data

INSTALLATION STEPS:
1. Extract all files to your desired location (e.g., C:\Program Files\ChuhuivWeather)
2. Run "ChuhuivWeather.App.exe" to start the application
3. The app will automatically create cache files in %LOCALAPPDATA%\ChuhuivWeather\

FIRST RUN:
- The application will attempt to fetch current weather data
- If successful, data will be cached for offline viewing
- Auto-refresh is enabled by default (hourly updates)

FEATURES:
- Current weather conditions for Chuhuiv, Ukraine
- 3-day weather forecast
- Automatic data caching for offline use
- Russian language interface
- Auto-refresh every hour

TROUBLESHOOTING:
- Ensure Windows Defender or antivirus allows the application
- Check internet connection if weather data doesn't load
- Cached data will be shown if network is unavailable

For detailed information, see README.md and RELEASE_NOTES_v1.0.0.md

VERSION: 1.0.0
BUILD: Self-Contained (includes .NET 9.0 runtime)
ARCHITECTURE: Windows x64
